tha-ap540:17.1: patthayate ṭhānaṃ → patthayi taṃ ṭhānaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap540:32.1: yathā raṅge → yathā laddho (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap540:37.2: ogāhetvā mahāvanaṃ → jahitvāna mahādhanaṃ (bj) | hivāna ca mahādhanaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap540:39.2: uruveḷanivāsiko → uruvelanivāsiko (bj) | uruvelāya nīvasiṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | uruvelānivāsitā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap540:42.2: katvāna vividhāni me → katvā nānāvidhāni me (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
